goal.ch: 學生在完成課程之後將具備以下能力: 1.理解核磁共振原理 2.理解核磁共振儀器工作原理 3.能分析脈衝序列 4.能夠執行簡單的核磁共振實驗。
goal.en: The students can understand the fundamental knowledge of NMR theory and NMR instrumentation. In addition, the students will be able to perform relevant NMR experiments.

outline.ch:
這個課程將涵蓋以下的主題:
- 核磁共振發展的歷史
- 以古典力學描述核磁共振
- 量子力學的回顧
- 孤立單自旋系統
- 耦合雙自旋系統
- 二維核磁共振光譜學
- 三維核磁共振光譜學
- 核磁共振弛豫
- 固態核磁共振
outline.en:
The course will consist of a mixture of theory-based lectures and practical tutorials, which will cover the following topics:
- History of nuclear magnetic resonance
- Classical description of NMR
- Review of quantum mechanics
- Single isolated spin
- Coupled two-spin system
- 2D NMR spectroscopy
- 3D NMR spectroscopy
- NMR Relaxation
- Solid-state NMR spectroscopy
